question 1

```{r}
log_growth <- function(N0, r, K, tfinal, tstep) {
  time <- seq(from = 0, to = tfinal, by = tstep)
  n_t <- K / (1 + ((K - N0) / N0) * exp(-r * time))
  output <- data.frame(
    time = time,
    population = n_t
  )
  return(output)
}

result <- log_growth(
  N0 = 10,
  r = 0.1,
  K = 100,
  tfinal = 50,
  tstep = 0.1
)
```

question 2

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

plot_growth <- function(df) {
  ggplot(df, aes(x = time, y = population)) +
    geom_line() +
    labs(
      x = "time",
      y = "pop size",
      title = "log pop growth"
    ) +
    theme_minimal()
}

plot_growth(result)
```
